author: LMG Clips
description:
Thanks to our LMG clips sponsors dbrand, Dell, and Secretlab. You can check them out at the links below:

dbrand: https://dbrand.com/pcb
Dell: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips
Secretlab: https://lmg.gg/secretlablmgclips

Linus and Luke discuss Meta’s new Ray-Ban smart glasses with a built-in display, gesture controls, and live translation features. While accessibility gains are promising, questions remain about privacy and whether the tech is ready for everyday use.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKmYYnMdW7E

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane

title: The New Meta Glasses are Wild
